mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_FIELD ( F_FIELD_ID, F_OWNER_CLASS_ID, F_FIELD_NAME, F_TYPE, F_WIDTH, F_SCALE, F_CREF_CLASS_ID, F_EREF_ENUM_ID, F_FREF_FIELD_ID, F_PK, F_NULLABLE, F_NEEDS_SUM, F_NEEDS_AVG, F_NEEDS_MAX, F_NEEDS_MIN, F_TITLE, F_DESCRIPTION, F_NOTE, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{ fieldId }, #{ ownerClassId }, #{ fieldName }, #{ type }, #{ width }, #{ scale }, #{ crefClassId }, #{ erefEnumId }, #{ frefFieldId }, #{ pk }, #{ nullable }, #{ needsSum }, #{ needsAvg }, #{ needsMax }, #{ needsMin }, #{ title }, #{ description }, #{ note }, (strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_FIELD SET F_OWNER_CLASS_ID = #{ ownerClassId }, F_FIELD_NAME = #{ fieldName }, F_TYPE = #{ type }, F_WIDTH = #{ width }, F_SCALE = #{ scale }, F_CREF_CLASS_ID = #{ crefClassId }, F_EREF_ENUM_ID = #{ erefEnumId }, F_FREF_FIELD_ID = #{ frefFieldId }, F_PK = #{ pk }, F_NULLABLE = #{ nullable }, F_NEEDS_SUM = #{ needsSum }, F_NEEDS_AVG = #{ needsAvg }, F_NEEDS_MAX = #{ needsMax }, F_NEEDS_MIN = #{ needsMin }, F_TITLE = #{ title }, F_DESCRIPTION = #{ description }, F_NOTE = #{ note }, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = (strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) WHERE F_FIELD_ID = #{ fieldId } AND F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = #{ _lastUpdatedAt }
mapper.select: SELECT T1.F_FIELD_ID AS "fieldId", T1.F_OWNER_CLASS_ID AS "ownerClassId", T1.F_FIELD_NAME AS "fieldName", T1.F_TYPE AS "type", T1.F_WIDTH AS "width", T1.F_SCALE AS "scale", T1.F_CREF_CLASS_ID AS "crefClassId", T1.F_EREF_ENUM_ID AS "erefEnumId", T1.F_FREF_FIELD_ID AS "frefFieldId", T1.F_PK AS "pk", T1.F_NULLABLE AS "nullable", T1.F_NEEDS_SUM AS "needsSum", T1.F_NEEDS_AVG AS "needsAvg", T1.F_NEEDS_MAX AS "needsMax", T1.F_NEEDS_MIN AS "needsMin", T1.F_TITLE AS "title", T1.F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", T1.F_NOTE AS "note", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_TITLE AS "_title", T2.F_TITLE AS "owner_title", T3.F_TITLE AS "cref_title", T4.F_TITLE AS "eref_title", T5.F_TITLE AS "fref_title" FROM T_FIELD T1 LEFT JOIN T_CLASS T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_CLASS_ID = T2.F_CLASS_ID LEFT JOIN T_CLASS T3 ON T1.F_CREF_CLASS_ID = T3.F_CLASS_ID LEFT JOIN T_ENUM T4 ON T1.F_EREF_ENUM_ID = T4.F_ENUM_ID LEFT JOIN T_FIELD T5 ON T1.F_FREF_FIELD_ID = T5.F_FIELD_ID WHERE T1.F_FIELD_ID = #{ fieldId }
